trans-unit.target: 缩略图和图标

trans-unit.source: To add a clear button to any input (like the search input), add the data-clear-btn="true" attribute. The text for this clear button can be customized via the data-clear-btn-text="clear input" attribute. Search buttons have the clear button by default and cannot be controlled by this option. Note that this is available for all the input types below except for those coded via textarea elements.
trans-unit.target: 要将清除按钮添加到任何输入（如搜索输入），请添加 data-clear-btn="true" 属性。可以通过 data-clear-btn-text="clear input" 属性来自定义此清除按钮的文本。搜索按钮默认情况下具有清除按钮，并且不能由此选项控制。请注意，这适用于下面的所有输入类型，但通过 textarea 元素编码的输入类型除外。

trans-unit.source: To add a count indicator to the right of the list item, wrap the number in an element with a class of ui-li-count
trans-unit.target: 要将计数指示器添加到列表项的右侧，请将数字包装在具有 ui-li-count 类的元素中

trans-unit.source: To add a select menu to your page, start with a standard select element populated with a set of option elements. Set the for attribute of the label to match the id of the select so they are semantically associated. It's possible to accessibly hide the label if it's not desired in the page layout, but we require that it is present in the markup for semantic and accessibility reasons.
trans-unit.target: 要将选择菜单添加到页面，请从填充了一组 option 元素的标准 select 元素开始。设置 label 的 for 属性以匹配 select 的 id ，以便它们在语义上相关联。如果页面布局中不需要标签，可以无障碍地隐藏标签，但是出于语义和可访问性的原因，我们要求标签中包含标签。

trans-unit.source: To add a slider widget to your page, use a standard input with the type="range" attribute. The input's value is used to configure the starting position of the handle and the value is populated in the text input. Specify min and max attribute values to set the slider's range. If you want to constrain input to specific increments, add the step attribute. Set the value attribute to define the initial value. The framework will parse these attributes to configure the slider widget.
trans-unit.target: 要将滑块控件添加到页面，请使用带有 type="range" 属性的标准输入。输入的值用于配置手柄的起始位置，并且该值填充在文本输入中。指定 min 和 max 属性值以设置滑块的范围。如果要将输入限制为特定的增量，请添加 step 属性。设置 value 属性以定义初始值。框架将解析这些属性以配置滑块小部件。

trans-unit.source: To add an explicit close button to a popup, add a link with the role of button into the popup container with a data-rel="back" attribute which will close the popup when tapped. We have created helper classes to position buttons in the upper left (ui-btn-left) or upper right (ui-btn-right) of the popup but you may need to tweak these or add custom positioning styles depending on your design. We recommend adding standard content padding to the popup to make room for the buttons (see next section).
trans-unit.target: 要将显式关闭按钮添加到弹出窗口中，请使用 data-rel="back" 属性将一个具有按钮角色的链接添加到弹出容器中，该属性将在点击时关闭弹出窗口。我们已经创建了帮助器类，以将按钮定位在弹出窗口的左上角（ ui-btn-left ）或右上角（ ui-btn-right ），但是您可能需要根据自己的设计进行调整或添加自定义定位样式。我们建议在弹出窗口中添加标准内容填充，以为按钮留出空间（请参阅下一节）。

trans-unit.source: To add icons to the navbar items, the data-icon attribute is used, specifying a standard mobile icon for each item.
trans-unit.target: 要将图标添加到导航栏项目，请使用 data-icon 属性，为每个项目指定一个标准的移动图标。

trans-unit.source: To add text hierarchy, use headings to increase font emphasis and use paragraphs to reduce emphasis.
trans-unit.target: 要增加文字层次,用标题来增加字体的强调,用段落来减少强调。

trans-unit.source: To add thumbnails to the left of a list item, simply add an image inside a list item as the first child element. The framework will scale the image to 80 pixels square. To use standard 16x16 pixel icons in list items, add the class of ui-li-icon to the image element.
trans-unit.target: 要将缩略图添加到列表项的左侧，只需在列表项内添加一个图像作为第一个子元素。该框架会将图像缩放到80像素平方。要在列表项中使用标准的16x16像素图标，请将 ui-li-icon 类添加到image元素。

trans-unit.source: To avoid blinks when opening a panel, we force hardware acceleration on WebKit browsers. The CSS that is used to do this can cause issues with buttons and form elements on the page if their container has a CSS multi-column layout (column-count). To resolve this you have to set the following rule for the element or its container:
trans-unit.target: 为了避免在打开面板时闪烁，我们在WebKit浏览器上强制进行硬件加速。如果容器的容器具有CSS多列布局（ column-count ），则用于执行此操作的CSS可能会导致页面上的按钮和表单元素出现问题。要解决此问题，必须为元素或其容器设置以下规则：

trans-unit.source: To build a two-column (50/50%) layout, start with a container with a class of ui-grid-a, and add two child containers inside it classed with ui-block-a for the first column and ui-block-b for the second:
trans-unit.target: 要构建两列（50/50％）的布局，请从一个包含 ui-grid-a class 的容器开始，并在其中添加两个子容器，其中第一列和 ui-block-b 分类为 ui-block-a -b第二个：

trans-unit.source: To collect standard alphanumeric text, use an input with a type="text" attribute. Set the for attribute of the label to match the id of the input so they are semantically associated. It's possible to accessibly hide the label if it's not desired in the page layout, but we require that it is present in the markup for semantic and accessibility reasons.
trans-unit.target: 要收集标准字母数字文本，请使用具有 type="text" 属性的 input 。设置 label 的 for 属性以匹配 input 的 id ，以便它们在语义上相关联。如果页面布局中不需要标签，可以无障碍地隐藏标签，但是出于语义和可访问性的原因，我们要求标签中包含标签。

trans-unit.source: To configure the loading dialog globally the following settings can be defined on its prototype during the mobileinit event.
trans-unit.target: 要全局配置加载对话框，可以在 mobileinit 事件期间在其原型上定义以下设置。

trans-unit.source: To control a panel from a link, point the href to the ID of the panel you want to toggle (mypanel in the example below). This instructs the framework to bind the link to the panel. This link will toggle the visibility of the panel so tapping it will open the panel, and tapping it again will close it.
trans-unit.target: 要通过链接控制面板，请将 href 指向要切换的面板的 ID （在以下示例中为 mypanel ）。这指示框架将链接绑定到面板。此链接将切换面板的可见性，因此点击它会打开面板，再次点击会关闭它。

trans-unit.source: To create a "cancel" button in a dialog, just link to the page that triggered the dialog to open and add the data-rel="back" attribute to your link. This pattern of linking to the previous page is also usable in non-JS devices as well.
trans-unit.target: 要在对话框中创建“取消”按钮，只需链接到触发对话框打开的页面，然后将 data-rel="back" 属性添加到链接。这种链接到上一页的模式也可以在非JS设备中使用。

trans-unit.source: To create a collapsible block of content, create a container and add the data-role="collapsible" attribute. Using the data-content-theme attribute allows you to set a theme for the content of the collapsible.
trans-unit.target: 要创建可折叠的内容块，请创建一个容器并添加 data-role="collapsible" 属性。使用 data-content-theme 属性可以为可折叠内容设置主题。

trans-unit.source: To create a flip switch add the attribute data-role="flipswitch" to a checkbox input or to a select which has two option values.
trans-unit.target: 要创建翻转开关，请将属性 data-role="flipswitch" 到复选框 input 或具有两个 option 值的 select 中。

trans-unit.source: To create a flip toggle, start with a select with two options. The first option will be styled as the "off" state switch and the second will be styled as the "on" state so write your options accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 要创建翻转切换，请从带有两个选项的 select 开始。第一个选项的样式将设置为“关闭”状态，第二个选项的样式将设置为“开启”状态，因此请相应地编写选项。

trans-unit.source: To create a grouped set of select inputs, first add select and a corresponding label. Set the for attribute of the label to match the id of the select so they are semantically associated.
trans-unit.target: 要创建一组选择输入，请首先添加 select 和相应的 label 。设置 label 的 for 属性以匹配 select 的 id ，以便它们在语义上相关联。

trans-unit.source: To create a popup, add the data-role="popup" attribute to a div with the popup contents. Then create a link with the href set to the id of the popup div, and add the attribute data-rel="popup" to tell the framework to open the popup when the link is tapped. This is a similar markup pattern to the dialog widget. A popup div has to be nested inside the same page as the link.
trans-unit.target: 要创建弹出窗口，请将 data-role="popup" 属性添加到具有弹出内容的div中。然后创建一个链接，其 href 设置为弹出窗口div 的 id ，并添加属性 data-rel="popup" 来告诉框架在点击链接时打开弹出窗口。这是类似于对话框小部件的标记模式。弹出div必须与链接嵌套在同一页面内。

trans-unit.source: To customize the breakpoints, copy the following style block into your custom style overrides and adjust the min-width media query values for each priority level to specify where various priority columns should appear.
trans-unit.target: 要自定义断点，请将以下样式块复制到自定义样式覆盖中，并调整每个优先级的 min-width 媒体查询值，以指定应在各个优先级列中显示的位置。

trans-unit.source: To display longer table header text in the column chooser or reflow labels, wrap the text in the TH with a abbr element and set the title. This string will be used in place.
trans-unit.target: 要在列选择器或重排标签中显示更长的表标题文本，请使用 abbr 元素将文本包装在 TH 中并设置 title 。该字符串将在原处使用。

trans-unit.source: To enable this behavior on a header or footer, add the data-position="fixed" attribute to a jQuery Mobile toolbar element.
trans-unit.target: 要在页眉或页脚上启用此行为，请将 data-position="fixed" 属性添加到jQuery Mobile工具栏元素。

trans-unit.source: To enable this option on a fixed header or footer, add the data-fullscreen attribute to the element.
trans-unit.target: 要在固定的页眉或页脚上启用此选项，请将 data-fullscreen 属性添加到元素。

trans-unit.source: To force the range to snap to a specific increment, add the step attribute to the input. By default, the step is 1, but in this example, the step is 0.1 and the maximum value is 10.
trans-unit.target: 要强制将范围捕捉到特定的增量，请在输入中添加 step 属性。默认情况下，步长为1，但在本示例中，步长为0.1，最大值为10。

trans-unit.source: To force the slider to snap to a specific increment, add the step attribute to the input. By default, the step is 1, but in this example, the step is 10 and the maximum value is 500.
trans-unit.target: 要强制滑块捕捉到特定的增量，请在输入中添加 step 属性。默认情况下，该步骤为1，但是在本示例中，该步骤为10，最大值为500。

trans-unit.source: To group buttons together into a button set, wrap the links in a wrapper with data-role="controlgroup" and data-type="horizontal" attributes.
trans-unit.target: 要将按钮分组到一个按钮集中，请使用 data-role="controlgroup" 和 data-type="horizontal" 属性将链接包装在包装器中。

trans-unit.source: To have a highlight fill on the track up to the slider handle position, add the data-highlight="true" attribute to the input. The fill uses active state swatch.
trans-unit.target: 要在轨迹上一直高亮显示直到滑块手柄位置，请将 data-highlight="true" 属性添加到输入中。填充使用活动状态色板。

trans-unit.source: To have individual sections in a group styled differently, add data-theme and data-content-theme attributes to specific collapsibles.
trans-unit.target: 要使组中的各个部分具有不同的样式，请将 data-theme 和 data-content-theme 属性添加到特定的可折叠对象。

trans-unit.source: To make a column persistent so it's not available for hiding, omit the data-priority attribute. This will make the column visible at all widths and won't be available in the column chooser menu.
trans-unit.target: 要使列具有持久性，使其无法隐藏，请省略 data-priority 属性。这将使列在所有宽度上均可见，并且在列选择器菜单中将不可用。

trans-unit.source: To make a footer persistent between transitions, add the data-id attribute to the footer of all relevant pages and use the same id value for each. For example, by adding data-id="myfooter" to the current page and the target page, the framework will keep the footer anchors in the same spot during the page animation. This effect will only work correctly if the header and footer toolbars are set to data-position="fixed" so they are in view during the transition.
trans-unit.target: 要使页脚在过渡之间持久存在，请将 data-id 属性添加到所有相关页面的页脚，并对每个页面使用相同的 id 值。例如，通过将 data-id="myfooter" 到当前页面和目标页面，框架将在页面动画过程中将页脚锚点保留在同一位置。仅当页眉和页脚工具栏设置为 data-position="fixed" ，此效果才能正确起作用，以便在过渡期间可以看到它们。

trans-unit.source: To make the page work alongside the open panel, it needs to re-flow to a narrower width so it will fit next to the panel. This can be done purely with CSS by adding a left or right margin equal to the panel width (17em) to the page contents to force a re-flow. Second, the invisible layer placed over the page for the click out to dismiss behavior is hidden with CSS so you can click on the page and not close the menu.
trans-unit.target: 为了使页面与打开的面板一起工作,它需要重新流向一个较窄的宽度,这样它就会适合面板旁边。这可以纯粹用CSS来完成,在页面内容上添加一个与面板宽度(17em)相等的左或右边距来强制重流。其次,用CSS将页面上放置的用于点击退出驳回行为的隐形层隐藏起来,这样就可以点击页面而不关闭菜单。

trans-unit.source: To make this responsive, start by adding the my-breakpoint class to the grid container that references the custom breakpoint in your custom stylesheet:
trans-unit.target: 为了使此响应，首先将 my-breakpoint 类添加到引用自定义样式表中的自定义断点的网格容器中：

trans-unit.source: To provide a stronger visual connection between the collapsible header and content, add the data-content-theme attribute to the wrapper and specify a theme swatch letter. This applies the border and background color of the swatch to the content block and changes the corner rounding to square off the bottom of the header and round the bottom of the content block instead to visually group these elements.
trans-unit.target: 为了在可折叠的标题和内容之间提供更强的视觉连接，请将 data-content-theme 属性添加到包装器并指定主题色板字母。这会将样例的边框和背景色应用于内容块，并将圆角的舍入更改为与标头底部的正方形相交，并在内容块的底部进行舍入，以可视方式对这些元素进行分组。

trans-unit.source: To render the children of an element filterable, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 要使一个元素的子元素可过滤,请执行以下步骤。

trans-unit.source: To set an item to the active state upon initialization of the navbar, add class="ui-btn-active" to the corresponding anchor in your markup. Additionaly add a class of ui-state-persist to make the framework restore the active state each time the page is shown while it exists in the DOM. The example below shows a navbar with item "One" set to active:
trans-unit.target: 要在导航栏初始化时将项目设置为活动状态，请将 class="ui-btn-active" 到标记中的相应锚点。另外，还添加了一类 ui-state-persist ,以使框架在页面在DOM中存在时每次显示时都恢复活动状态。下面的示例显示了一个导航栏，其中项目“一个”设置为活动：

trans-unit.source: To set the theme color for a navbar item, add the data-theme attribute to the individual links and specify a theme swatch. Note that applying a theme swatch to the navbar container is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 要设置导航栏项目的主题颜色，请将 data-theme 属性添加到各个链接并指定主题色板。请注意，不支持将主题色板应用于导航栏容器。

trans-unit.source: To set the theme on a collapsible header button, add the data-theme attribute to the wrapper and specify a swatch letter. Note that you can mix and match swatch letters between the header and content with these theme attributes.
trans-unit.target: 要将主题设置在可折叠的标题按钮上，请将 data-theme 属性添加到包装器并指定一个样例字母。请注意，可以使用这些主题属性在标题和内容之间混合并匹配色板字母。

trans-unit.source: To set the theme swatch for the rangeslider, add a data-theme attribute to the inputs which will apply the theme to the inputs, handles and track. The track swatch can be set separately by adding the data-track-theme attribute to apply the down state version of the selected button swatch.
trans-unit.target: 要设置主题样片的rangeslider，添加 data-theme 属性的 inputs 将适用主题，以输入，处理和跟踪。可以通过添加 data-track-theme 属性以应用所选按钮色板的向下状态版本来分别设置轨道色板。

trans-unit.source: To set the theme swatch for the slider, add a data-theme attribute to the input which will apply the theme to both the input, handle and track. The track swatch can be set separately by adding the data-track-theme attribute to apply the down state version of the selected button swatch.
trans-unit.target: 要为滑块设置主题色板，请在 input 添加一个 data-theme 属性，该属性会将主题应用于输入，手柄和跟踪。可以通过添加 data-track-theme 属性以应用所选按钮色板的向下状态版本来分别设置轨道色板。

trans-unit.source: To suppress the icon, a boolean expression must be used:
trans-unit.target: 要压制图标,必须使用布尔表达式。

trans-unit.source: To target styles against only a specific button, use the unique href value that is generated to target a specific column chooser button. For example, a table with an ID of movie-table will generate a popup with an ID of movie-table-popup so a CSS selector of a[href="#movie-table-popup"] will target only the column popup button for this specific table.
trans-unit.target: 若要仅针对特定按钮指定样式，请使用生成的唯一 href 值来定向特定列选择器按钮。例如，一个 ID 为 movie-table -table的表将生成一个 ID 为 movie-table-popup 的弹出窗口,因此 a[href="#movie-table-popup"] 的CSS选择器将仅定位列弹出按钮对于此特定表。

trans-unit.source: To use custom icons, specify a data-icon value that has a unique name like myapp-email and the button plugin will generate a class by prefixing ui-icon- to the data-icon value and apply it to the button: ui-icon-myapp-email.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义图标，指定 data-icon 有类似的唯一名称值 myapp-email 和按钮插件将通过在前面产生的一类 ui-icon- 的 data-icon 值，并将其应用到按钮： ui-icon-myapp-email 。

trans-unit.source: To use custom menus on a specific select, just add the data-native-menu="false" attribute. Alternately, this can also programmatically set the select menu's nativeMenu configuration option to false in a callback bound to the mobileinit event to achieve the same effect. This will globally make all selects use the custom menu by default. The following must be included in the page after jQuery is loaded but before jQuery Mobile is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要在特定 select 上使用自定义菜单，只需添加 data-native-menu="false" 属性。或者，这也可以在绑定到 mobileinit 事件的回调中以编程方式将选择菜单的 nativeMenu 配置选项设置为 false ，以实现相同的效果。默认情况下，这将使所有选择全局使用自定义菜单。在加载jQuery之后但在加载jQuery Mobile之前，页面中必须包含以下内容。

trans-unit.source: To use the filter as an autocomplete that taps into remote data sources, you can use the filterablebeforefilter event to dynamically populate a listview as a user types a search query. This is useful when you have a very large data set like cities, zip codes, or products that can't be loaded up-front locally. Use the view source button to see the JavaScript that powers this demo.
trans-unit.target: 要将筛选器用作进入远程数据源的自动完成功能，可以使用 filterablebeforefilter 事件在用户键入搜索查询时动态填充列表视图。当您拥有非常庞大的数据集（例如城市，邮政编码或无法在本地预先加载的产品）时，此功能非常有用。使用“查看源代码”按钮查看为该演示提供支持的JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: To use this preset breakpoint, add the ui-responsive class to the grid container to apply the stacked presentation below 560px (35em). If this breakpoint doesn't work for your content, we encourage you to write a custom breakpoint as described above.
trans-unit.target: 要使用此预置断点，将添加 ui-responsive 类网格容器应用堆叠呈现低于 560像素（35em）。如果此断点不适用于您的内容，我们建议您如上所述编写一个自定义断点。

trans-unit.source: Together, these two behaviors reproduce the jQuery Mobile 1.3 behavior of the listview filter.
trans-unit.target: 这两个行为共同重现了jQuery Mobile 1.3中列表视图过滤器的行为。

trans-unit.target: Transitions

trans-unit.target: 在弹出窗口完全打开后触发。

trans-unit.target: 在快速、完整的触摸事件后触发。

trans-unit.target: 在持续的完全触摸事件后触发。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other jQuery projects, such as jQuery and jQuery UI, jQuery Mobile automatically applies many markup enhancements as soon as it loads (long before the document.ready event fires). These enhancements are applied based on jQuery Mobile's default settings, which are designed to work with common scenarios. If changes to the settings are needed, they are easy to configure.
trans-unit.target: 与其他jQuery项目（例如jQuery和jQuery UI）不同，jQuery Mobile会在加载后自动应用许多标记增强功能（很早在 document.ready 事件触发之前）。这些增强功能是根据jQuery Mobile的默认设置应用的，这些默认设置旨在与常见方案配合使用。如果需要更改设置，则易于配置。

trans-unit.source: Use vclick with caution on touch devices. Webkit based browsers synthesize mousedown, mouseup, and click events roughly 300ms after the touchend event is dispatched. The target of the synthesized mouse events are calculated at the time they are dispatched and are based on the location of the touch events and, in some cases, the implementation specific heuristics which leads to different target calculations on different devices and even different OS versions for the same device. This means the target element within the original touch events could be different from the target element within the synthesized mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 在触摸设备上谨慎使用vclick。基于Webkit的浏览器在调度 touchend 事件后大约300毫秒内合成 mousedown ， mouseup 和 click 事件。合成鼠标事件的目标是在分派它们时进行计算的，并且基于触摸事件的位置，在某些情况下，还取决于实现特定的启发式方法，这会导致在不同设备上甚至在不同的OS版本上进行不同的目标计算。同一台设备。这意味着原始触摸事件中的目标元素可能与合成鼠标事件中的目标元素不同。

trans-unit.source: Utility method for parsing a URL and its relative variants into an object that makes accessing the components of the URL easy. When parsing relative variants, the resulting object will contain empty string values for missing components (like protocol, host, etc). Also, when parsing URLs that have no authority, such as tel: urls, the pathname property of the object will contain the data after the protocol/scheme colon.

trans-unit.source: We normally recommend starting with mobile-first approach for media queries: starting with the styles that apply to the smallest screen sizes in the core widget styles, then progressively layering breakpoints up to larger screens by using min-width media queries.
trans-unit.target: 通常，我们建议从移动优先的方法开始进行媒体查询：从适用于核心小部件样式中最小屏幕尺寸的样式开始，然后使用 min-width 媒体查询将断点逐渐分层到更大的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: We provide a set of "virtual" mouse events that attempt to abstract away mouse and touch events. This allows the developer to register listeners for the basic mouse events, such as mousedown, mousemove, mouseup, and click, and the plugin will take care of registering the correct listeners behind the scenes to invoke the listener at the fastest possible time for that device. In touch environments, the plugin retains the order of event firing that is seen in traditional mouse environments, so for example, vmousedown is always dispatched before vmouseup, and vmouseup before vclick, etc. The virtual mouse events also normalize how coordinate information is extracted from the event, so in touch based environments, coordinates are available from the pageX, pageY, screenX, screenY, clientX, and clientY properties, directly on the event object.
trans-unit.target: 我们提供了一组 "虚拟 "鼠标事件,试图抽象出鼠标和触摸事件。这允许开发者为基本的鼠标事件注册监听器,如mousedown、mousemove、mouseup和click,插件将在幕后负责注册正确的监听器,以最快的速度为该设备调用监听器。在触摸环境中,插件保留了传统鼠标环境中的事件发射顺序,例如,vmousedown总是在vmouseup之前调度,vmouseup在vclick之前等等。虚拟鼠标事件还规范了从事件中提取坐标信息的方式,所以在基于触摸的环境中,坐标可以从pageX、pageY、screenX、screenY、clientX和clientY属性中,直接在事件对象上获得。

trans-unit.source: We provide a set of "virtual" mouse events that attempt to abstract away mouse and touch events. This allows the developer to register listeners for the basic mouse events, such as mousedown, mousemove, mouseup, and click, and the plugin will take care of registering the correct listeners behind the scenes to invoke the listener at the fastest possible time for that device. In touch environments, the plugin retains the order of event firing that is seen in traditional mouse environments, so for example, vmouseup is always dispatched before vmousedown, and vmousedown before vclick, etc. The virtual mouse events also normalize how coordinate information is extracted from the event, so in touch based environments, coordinates are available from the pageX, pageY, screenX, screenY, clientX, and clientY properties, directly on the event object.
trans-unit.target: 我们提供了一组 "虚拟 "鼠标事件,试图抽象出鼠标和触摸事件。这使得开发者可以为基本的鼠标事件注册监听器,如mousedown、mousemove、mouseup和click,插件将在幕后负责注册正确的监听器,以最快的速度为该设备调用监听器。在触摸环境中,插件保留了传统鼠标环境中的事件发射顺序,例如,vmouseup总是在vmousedown之前调度,vmousedown在vclick之前调度等等。虚拟鼠标事件还规范了从事件中提取坐标信息的方式,所以在基于触摸的环境中,坐标可以从pageX、pageY、screenX、screenY、clientX和clientY属性中,直接在事件对象上获得。

trans-unit.source: We recommend binding to this event instead of DOM ready() because this will work regardless of whether the page is loaded directly or if the content is pulled into another page as part of the Ajax navigation system.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议绑定这个事件而不是DOM ready(),因为无论页面是直接加载还是作为Ajax导航系统的一部分将内容拉入另一个页面,这个事件都会工作。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using click instead of vclick anytime the action being triggered has the possibility of changing the content underneath the point that was touched on screen. This includes page transitions and other behaviors such as collapse/expand that could result in the screen shifting or content being completely replaced.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议， vclick 触发的动作有可能在屏幕上触摸的点下方更改内容，就可以使用 click 而不是vclick。这包括页面过渡和其他行为，例如折叠/展开，可能会导致屏幕移动或内容被完全替换。

trans-unit.source: We recommend writing media query widths are in em's so they respond to font size changes. To convert a pixel width into em's, divide the target width by 16 (pixels). Use this value for the min-width value in the media query above.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议将媒体查询宽度写在 em 中，以便它们响应字体大小的变化。要将像素宽度转换为 em ，请将目标宽度除以16（像素）。将此值用作上面媒体查询中的 min-width 值。

trans-unit.source: When true, and the search input string is empty, all items are hidden instead of shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，并且搜索输入字符串为空，则所有项目都将隐藏而不是显示。

trans-unit.source: When a position: fixed element appears anywhere on a page, most 2D CSS transforms will fail. Oddly, only translate transforms seem unaffected by this. Even more oddly, this issue is solved by setting a CSS opacity of .9 or below on the parent of the fixed element.
trans-unit.target: 当 position: fixed 元素出现在页面上的任何位置时，大多数2D CSS转换将失败。奇怪的是，只有 translate 转换似乎不受此影响。更奇怪的是，通过在固定元素的父级上将CSS opacity 设置为.9或更低，可以解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: When a link in the navbar is clicked it gets the active (selected) state. The ui-btn-active class is first removed from all anchors in the navbar before it is added to the activated link. If this is a link to another page, the class will be removed again after the transition has completed.
trans-unit.target: 单击导航栏中的链接时，它将进入活动（选定）状态。首先将 ui-btn-active 类从导航栏中的所有锚点删除，然后再将其添加到激活的链接中。如果这是到另一个页面的链接，则在转换完成后，该类将再次删除。

trans-unit.source: When a select is large enough to where the menu will open in a new page, the placeholder text is displayed in the button when no items are selected, and the label text is displayed in the menu's header. This differs from smaller overlay menus where the placeholder text is displayed in both the button and the header, and from full-page single selects where the placeholder text is not used at all.
trans-unit.target: 当选择的内容足够大到可以在新页面中打开菜单的位置时，如果未选择任何项目，则占位符文本显示在按钮中，而 label 文本显示在菜单标题中。这与较小的覆盖菜单不同，在较小的覆盖菜单中，在按钮和页眉中都显示了占位符文本，而在整页单选中，根本没有使用占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: When an arrow is requested using the arrow option, the popup is positioned along one of the edges of the popup such that the arrow points at the center of the origin. The value of the arrow option is a comma-separated list of letters referring to the edges of the popup along which the framework should attempt to place the arrow:
trans-unit.target: 使用 arrow 选项请求箭头时，弹出窗口沿弹出窗口的边缘之一放置，使箭头指向原点的中心。 arrow 选项的值是一个逗号分隔的字母列表，表示框架应沿其放置箭头的弹出窗口的边缘：

trans-unit.source: When any link is clicked within a dialog, the framework will automatically close the dialog and transition to the requested page, just as if the dialog were a normal page. Nevertheless, dialogs can also be chained, as explained below under "Chaining Dialogs". Similarly, a link that opens a popup will also leave the dialog in place.
trans-unit.target: 在对话框中单击任何链接时，框架将自动关闭对话框并转换到请求的页面，就像对话框是普通页面一样。但是，对话框也可以链接，如下文“链接对话框”中所述。同样，打开弹出窗口的链接也将对话框保留在原位。

trans-unit.source: When false, the container is initially expanded with a minus icon in the header.
trans-unit.target: 当为 "false "时,容器最初会以标题中的减号图标展开。

trans-unit.source: When filtering listview items, the default filter callback will not hide list items marked as dividers, however,
trans-unit.target: 当过滤列表视图项时,默认的过滤器回调不会隐藏标记为分隔线的列表项,但是。

trans-unit.source: When filtering listview items, the widget enables the listview widget's hidedividers option, which causes the new listview hidedividers extension to automatically hide dividers for categories wherein all items are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 在过滤列表视图项目时，该小部件会启用列表视图小部件的 hidedividers 选项，这会导致新的listview hidedividers扩展自动隐藏所有项目均已隐藏的类别的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: When finding elements by their jQuery Mobile data attribute, please use the custom selector :jqmData(). It automatically incorporates namespaced data attributes into the lookup when they are in use. For example, instead of calling $("div[data-role='page']"), you should use $("div:jqmData(role='page')"), which internally maps to $("div[data-"+ $.mobile.ns +"role='page']") without forcing you to concatenate a namespace into your selectors manually.
trans-unit.target: 通过jQuery Mobile数据属性查找元素时，请使用自定义选择器 :jqmData() 。当使用命名空间的数据属性时，它将自动将其合并到查找中。例如，您应该使用 $("div:jqmData(role='page')") 而不是调用 $("div[data-role='page']") ），它内部会映射到 $("div[data-"+ $.mobile.ns +"role='page']") 而不必强迫您将名称空间手动连接到选择器中。

trans-unit.source: When it has too many options to show on the device's screen, the framework will automatically create a new dialog-style "page" populated with a standard listview for the options. This allows us to use the native scrolling included on the device for moving through a long list. The text inside the label is used as the title for this page. Be aware of the page and pagecontainer events that will be fired for this generated page.
trans-unit.target: 当设备屏幕上无法显示太多选项时，框架将自动创建一个新的对话框样式“页面”，其中填充了这些选项的标准列表视图。这使我们可以使用设备中包含的本机滚动浏览长列表。 label 内的文本用作此页面的标题。请注意将为此生成的页面触发的page和pagecontainer事件。

trans-unit.source: When jQuery Mobile attempts to load an external page, the request runs through $.mobile.loadPage(). This will only allow cross-domain requests if $.mobile.allowCrossDomainPages is set to true. Because the jQuery Mobile framework tracks what page is being viewed within the browser's location hash, it is possible for a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack to occur if the XSS code in question can manipulate the hash and set it to a cross-domain URL of its choice. This is the main reason that the default setting for $.mobile.allowCrossDomainPages is set to false. In PhoneGap apps that must "phone home" by loading assets off a remote server, both the $.support.cors AND $.mobile.allowCrossDomainPages must be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 当jQuery Mobile尝试加载外部页面时，请求将通过 $.mobile.loadPage() 运行。仅在 $.mobile.allowCrossDomainPages 设置为true 时，才允许跨域请求。因为jQuery Mobile框架跟踪浏览器的位置哈希中正在查看的页面，所以如果所讨论的XSS代码可以操纵哈希并将其设置为跨域，则可能会发生跨站点脚本（XSS）攻击。选择的网址。这是将$ .mobile.allowCrossDomainPages的默认设置设置为false的主要原因。在PhoneGap的应用程式必须“手机之家”通过加载资产从远程服务器，无论是 $.support.cors 和 $.mobile.allowCrossDomainPages 必须设置为true。

trans-unit.source: When jQuery Mobile starts, it triggers a mobileinit event on the document object. To override default settings, bind to mobileinit.
trans-unit.target: jQuery Mobile启动时，它将触发 document 对象上的 mobileinit 事件。要覆盖默认设置，请绑定到 mobileinit 。

trans-unit.source: When padding is added, we apply a few style rules to negate the top margin for the first heading or paragraph in the popup and do the same for the last element's bottom margin. This keep the popups from having too much vertical space when the content padding and element margins combine.
trans-unit.target: 当添加padding时,我们应用一些样式规则来否定弹出窗口中第一个标题或段落的上边距,并对最后一个元素的下边距做同样的处理。这样,当内容padding和元素margins结合在一起时,弹出的内容就不会有太多的垂直空间。

trans-unit.source: When received with data.toPage set to a jQuery object, the event indicates that the destination page has been loaded and navigation will continue.
trans-unit.target: 接收到 data.toPage 设置为jQuery对象时，该事件表示目标页面已加载，导航将继续。

trans-unit.source: When received with data.toPage set to a string, the event indicates that navigation is about to commence. The value stored in data.toPage is the URL of the page that will be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 当 data.toPage 设置为字符串时，该事件表示导航即将开始。存储在 data.toPage 中的值是将要加载的页面的URL。

trans-unit.source: When set to true all children are hidden whenever the search string is empty.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 时，只要搜索字符串为空，所有子项都将隐藏。

trans-unit.source: When set to true and all list items residing under a given divider become hidden, then the divider itself is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 true 时，位于给定分隔符下的所有列表项都将被隐藏，则分隔符本身将被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, .buttonMarkup() discards all classes on each of the set of matched elements and adds classes based on the values passed into the options argument. You can use this feature to increase performance in situations where the element you wish to enhance does not have any classes other than the button styling classes added by .buttonMarkup().
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 true 时， .buttonMarkup() 丢弃所有匹配元素集上的所有类，并基于传递到 options 参数中的值添加类。如果希望增强的元素除了 .buttonMarkup() 添加的按钮样式类之外没有任何其他类，则可以使用此功能来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, clicking the custom-styled select menu will open the native select menu which is best for performance. If set to false, the custom select menu style will be used instead of the native menu.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "true "时,点击自定义风格的选择菜单将打开性能最佳的原生选择菜单。如果设置为false,则将使用自定义选择菜单样式代替原生菜单。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, dividers are automatically created for the listview items.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "true "时,会自动为列表视图项创建分隔线。

trans-unit.source: When the select has a small number of options that will fit on the device's screen, the menu will appear as a small overlay with a pop transition:
trans-unit.target: 当 select 具有少量选项且适合设备屏幕时，菜单将显示为带有弹出过渡的小覆盖图：

trans-unit.source: When the DOM is ready, the framework should automatically call $.mobile.initializePage. If false, the page will not initialize and will be visually hidden until $.mobile.initializePage is manually called.
trans-unit.target: DOM准备就绪后，框架应自动调用 $.mobile.initializePage 。如果为false，该页面将不会初始化，并且将在视觉上隐藏，直到手动调用 $.mobile.initializePage 。

trans-unit.source: When the column chooser menu opens, the column checkboxes will be checked or unchecked based on the visibility of each column based on the media queries so it accurately reflects what is being seen. These media queries to hide or show columns act as sensible defaults for what columns should be shown based on the developer's understanding of the column importance and data values. The chooser menu allows the user to have control of the table presentation so this takes precedence over the default display.
trans-unit.target: 当打开列选择器菜单时,将根据媒体查询的每一列的可见性来勾选或取消勾选列复选框,这样就能准确地反映出所看到的内容。这些隐藏或显示列的媒体查询作为合理的默认值,根据开发人员对列重要性和数据值的理解,应该显示哪些列。选择器菜单允许用户对表的显示进行控制,所以这优先于默认显示。

trans-unit.source: When the flipswitch widget is based on a checkbox rather than a select the value of this option is used as the label for the "Off" state.
trans-unit.target: 当flipswitch小部件基于复选框而不是 select 时，此选项的值用作“关闭”状态的标签。

trans-unit.source: When the flipswitch widget is based on a checkbox rather than a select the value of this option is used as the label for the "On" state.
trans-unit.target: 当flipswitch小部件基于复选框而不是 select 时，此选项的值用作“打开”状态的标签。

trans-unit.source: When the popup is closed the width and height should be set back to 0. You can do this by binding to the popupafterclose event.
trans-unit.target: 当弹出窗口关闭时，宽度和高度应设置为0。可以通过绑定到 popupafterclose 事件来做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: When the popup opens, center in the window.
trans-unit.target: 当弹出的窗口打开后,在窗口中居中。

trans-unit.source: When the popup opens, center over the coordinates passed to the open() call (see details on this method).
trans-unit.target: 当弹出窗口打开时，以传递给 open() 调用的坐标为中心（请参见此方法的详细信息）。

trans-unit.source: When the popup opens, create a jQuery object based on the selector, and center over it. The selector is filtered for elements that are visible with ":visible". If the result is empty, the popup will be centered in the window.
trans-unit.target: 当弹出窗口打开时，基于选择器创建一个jQuery对象，并将其居中。选择器将过滤通过 ":visible" 可见的元素。如果结果为空，则弹出窗口将在窗口中居中。

trans-unit.source: When the push or reveal display is used, a panel pushes the page aside when it opens. Since some of the page is pushed offscreen, the panel is modal and must be closed to interact with the page content again. On larger screens, you may want to have the panel work more like a collapsible column that can be opened and used alongside the page to take better use of the screen real estate.
trans-unit.target: 当使用推送或揭示显示时,面板打开后会将页面推到一边。由于部分页面被推到屏幕外,面板是模态的,必须关闭才能再次与页面内容交互。在较大的屏幕上,你可能希望面板的工作方式更像一个可折叠的列,可以打开并与页面一起使用,以更好地利用屏幕空间。

trans-unit.source: When the user taps on the page and the tapToggle option is set on the fixed toolbar widget, the element on which the user has tapped is examined before the visibility of the toolbar is toggled. If the element on which the user has tapped matches the selector provided as the value of this option, then the toolbar is not toggled.
trans-unit.target: 当用户点击页面并在固定的工具栏小部件上设置了 tapToggle 选项时，在切换工具栏的可见性之前，先检查用户轻按的元素。如果用户点击的元素与作为此选项的值提供的选择器匹配，则不会切换工具栏。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to false the base tag value in browsers that support a dynamic base tag and URL prefixes in browsers that don't won't be updated to reflect where the page was loaded from. This means that resource references that are relative to the page on which they are defined may break. This option is available for web frameworks that operate under a universal base tag value where all links and assets are relative to a single base.
trans-unit.target: 当将此属性设置为 false 时，在支持动态基本标记的浏览器中，基本标记值和不会更新的浏览器中的URL前缀不会更新以反映页面的加载位置。这意味着相对于定义它们的页面的资源引用可能会中断。该选项适用于在通用基础标签值下运行的Web框架，其中所有链接和资产均相对于单个基础。

trans-unit.source: When using layout grids for building full-level layouts, it may make sense to apply responsive web design (RWD) principles to ensure that the layout adapts to a wide range screen widths.
trans-unit.target: 当使用布局网格来构建完整级别的布局时，应采用响应式Web设计（RWD）原则以确保布局适应大范围的屏幕宽度。

trans-unit.source: When using an iframe inside a popup it is important to initially set the width and height attributes to 0. This prevents the page to breaking on platforms like Android 2.3. Note that you have to set the attributes, because setting the width and height with CSS is not sufficient. You can leave the actual width and height in the markup for browsers that have JavaScript disabled and use attr() to set the zero values upon the pageinit event.
trans-unit.target: 在弹出窗口中使用iframe时，将宽度和高度属性初始设置为0很重要。这样可以防止页面在Android 2.3等平台上中断。请注意，您必须设置属性，因为用CSS设置宽度和高度是不够的。对于禁用了JavaScript的浏览器，您可以在标记中保留实际的宽度和高度，并使用 attr() 在 pageinit 事件中设置零值。

trans-unit.source: When using icons, you must always specify an icon position class along with the icon class, because there is no longer a default icon position. In the example below the class ui-btn-icon-left is added to make sure the icon (ui-icon-arrow-r) will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用图标时，必须始终与图标类一起指定图标位置类，因为不再有默认的图标位置。在下面的示例中，添加了 ui-btn-icon-left 类，以确保将显示图标（ ui-icon-arrow-r ）。

trans-unit.source: When using markup to control panels, you can only have a single panel open at once. Clicking a link to open a panel while one is already open will auto-close the first. This is done to keep the markup-only configuration simple.
trans-unit.target: 当使用标记来控制面板时,你只能同时打开一个面板。当一个面板已经打开的时候,点击一个链接打开一个面板会自动关闭第一个面板。这样做的目的是为了保持单纯的标记配置的简单性。

trans-unit.source: When using pages styled as dialogs (data-role="page" data-dialog="true"), if you wish for them to have a different transition than regular pages, you must specify the transition on the link that opens them by adding the attribute data-transition="pop" to the link. "pop" is just an example. You may specify any transition you wish, such as "slide", "flip", or "none".
trans-unit.target: 当使用样式为对话框的页面（ data-role="page" data-dialog="true" ）时，如果希望它们具有与常规页面不同的过渡，则必须在打开链接的链接上指定过渡，方法是添加链接的 data-transition="pop" 属性。 “流行”只是一个例子。您可以指定所需的任何过渡，例如“幻灯片”，“翻转”或“无”。

trans-unit.source: When working with jQuery Mobile, jqmData should be used in place of jQuery core's data method (note that this includes $.fn.data, $.fn.removeData, and the $.data, $.removeData, and $.hasData utilities), as they automatically incorporate getting and setting of namespaced data attributes (even if no namespace is currently in use).
trans-unit.target: 在使用jQuery Mobile时，应使用jqmData代替jQuery core的 data 方法（请注意，这包括 $.fn.data ， $.fn.removeData 以及 $.data ， $.removeData 和 $.hasData 实用程序） ，因为它们会自动合并获取和设置命名空间的数据属性（即使当前没有使用命名空间）。

trans-unit.source: When working with jQuery Mobile, jqmRemoveData should be used in place of jQuery core's removeData method (note that this includes $.fn.data, $.fn.removeData, and the $.data, $.removeData, and $.hasData utilities), as they automatically incorporate getting and setting of namespaced data attributes (even if no namespace is currently in use).
trans-unit.target: 使用jQuery Mobile时，应使用jqmRemoveData代替jQuery核心的 removeData 方法（请注意，这包括 $.fn.data ， $.fn.removeData 以及 $.data ， $.removeData 和 $.hasData 实用程序） ，因为它们会自动合并获取和设置命名空间的数据属性（即使当前没有使用命名空间）。

trans-unit.source: When you add the data-collapsed="false" attribute to the wrapper the collapsible will initially be expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当将 data-collapsed="false" 属性添加到包装器时，可折叠对象将首先被展开。

trans-unit.source: When you dynamically add content to a panel or make hidden content visible while the panel is open, you have to trigger the updatelayout event on the panel.

trans-unit.source: When you launch the popup from any of the buttons, the data-transition set on the button will be used. trans-unit.source: When you provide such pre-rendered markup you must also set all the classes that the framework would normally set, and you must also set all data attributes whose values differ from the default to indicate that the pre-rendered markup reflects the non-default value of the corresponding widget option.

trans-unit.source: While all form elements are now tested to work correctly within static toolbars as of jQuery Mobile 1.1, we recommend extensive testing when using form elements within fixed toolbars or within any position: fixed elements. This can potentially trigger a number of unpredictable issues in various mobile browsers, Android 2.2/2.3 in particular (detailed in Known issues in Android 2.2/2.3, below).
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery Mobile 1.1开始，虽然所有表单元素都经过测试可在静态工具栏中正常工作，但是当在固定工具栏内或任何 position: fixed 元素时，我们建议进行大量测试。这可能会在各种移动浏览器（尤其是Android 2.2 / 2.3）中引发许多不可预测的问题（在下面的Android 2.2 / 2.3中的“ 已知问题”中详细介绍）。

trans-unit.source: While we will continue to try to find ways to mitigate these bugs as best we can, we currently advise against implementing fixed toolbars containing complicated user styles and form elements without extensive testing in all versions of Android's native browser.
trans-unit.target: 虽然我们将继续努力寻找尽可能减轻这些错误的方法,但我们目前建议不要在没有在所有版本的Android原生浏览器中进行广泛测试的情况下,实施包含复杂用户样式和表单元素的固定工具栏。

trans-unit.source: With our mobile-first approach, the base styles for a reflow table stacks each row and presents each cell in the label/data style format. This is done by hiding the table header rows, making each table cell display:block so they are stacked. The the label element injected into each cell is styled as display:inline-block with a min-width:30% rule to place the labels on the same line as the content at a consistent width to form a two column presentation.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的移动优先方法，回流表的基本样式将每行堆叠在一起，并以标签/数据样式格式显示每个单元格。这是通过隐藏表标题行，使每个表单元格 display:block 以便将它们堆叠起来。注入到每个单元格中的label元素的样式设置为 display:inline-block ，具有 min-width:30% 规则，以将标签与内容放置在同一行上且宽度一致，以形成两列显示。

trans-unit.source: Within the collapsible container, the first immediate child element that matches this selector will be used as the header for the collapsible.
trans-unit.target: 在可折叠容器中,第一个与该选择器相匹配的子元素将被用作可折叠容器的头。

trans-unit.source: Within the grid container, child elements are assigned ui-block-a/b/c/d/e in a sequential manner which makes each "block" element float side-by-side, forming the grid. The ui-block-a class essentially clears the floats which will start a new line (see multiple row grids, below).
trans-unit.target: 在网格容器内，以顺序方式为子元素分配 ui-block-a/b/c/d/e ，使每个“块”元素并排浮动，从而形成网格。该 ui-block-a 类基本清除，这将启动一个新行的花车（见多行网格，下同）。

trans-unit.source: Within this media query, we set the width to 100% and negate the float property to make the grid blocks stack below 50em screen widths. These rules are applied to every grid type by stacking up selectors for all the grid classes from ui-block-a to ui-block-e on the styles.
trans-unit.target: 在此媒体查询中，我们将宽度设置为100％，并否定float属性以使网格块堆叠在50em屏幕宽度以下。通过堆叠样式上从 ui-block-a 到 ui-block-e 的所有网格类别的选择器，可以将这些规则应用于每种网格类型。

trans-unit.source: Without the custom styles, our grid will be a 3 column layout across all screen widths:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有自定义样式,我们的网格将在所有屏幕宽度上采用3列布局。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally use custom-styled select menus instead of the native OS menu. The custom menu supports disabled options and multiple selection (whereas native mobile OS support for both is inconsistent), adds an elegant way to handle placeholder values, and restores missing functionality on certain platforms such as optgroup support on Android (all explained below). In addition, the framework applies the custom button's theme to the menu to better match the look and feel and provide visual consistency across platforms. Lastly, custom menus often look better on desktop browsers because native desktop menus are smaller than their mobile counterparts and tend to look disproportionate.
trans-unit.target: 您可以选择使用自定义样式的选择菜单，而不使用本机OS菜单。自定义菜单支持禁用的选项和多项选择（而这两者对本机移动操作系统的支持不一致），添加了一种优雅的方式来处理占位符值，并在某些平台上恢复了缺失的功能，例如Android上的 optgroup 支持（均在下文中进行了说明）。此外，该框架将自定义按钮的主题应用于菜单，以更好地匹配外观，并提供跨平台的视觉一致性。最后，自定义菜单在桌面浏览器上通常看起来更好，因为本机桌面菜单比移动菜单小，并且看起来不成比例。

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用jQuery的 $.extend 方法扩展 $.mobile 对象来覆盖默认设置。

trans-unit.source: You can provide a custom callback if you need to process the children in special ways.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要以特殊方式处理子级，则可以提供自定义回调。

trans-unit.source: You can set a panel to position:fixed, so its contents will appear no matter how far down the page you're scrolled, by adding the data-position-fixed="true" attribute to the panel. The framework also checks to see if the panel contents will fit within the viewport before applying the fixed positioning because this property would prevent the panel contents from scrolling and using overflow is not well supported enough to use at this time. If the panel contents are too long to fit within the viewport, the framework will simply display the panel without fixed positioning.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将面板设置为 position:fixed ，因此，通过向面板添加 data-position-fixed="true" 属性，无论您滚动的页面有多深，其内容都会出现。框架还会在应用固定位置之前检查面板内容是否适合视口，因为此属性将阻止面板内容滚动，并且此 overflow 不能充分支持使用溢出功能。如果面板内容太长而无法容纳在视口中，则框架将仅显示面板而没有固定的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can set the icon for the right split icon by specifying a data-split-icon attribute on the listview with an icon name you want. The default icon is "carat-r" but can be configured with the splitIconlistview option. By adding a data-icon attribute to the list item, you can set individual icons for each split. The theme swatch color of the split button defaults to "b" (blue in the default theme) but can be set by specifying a swatch letter with the data-split-theme attribute at the listview level or for individual splits with the data-theme attribute at the link level.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过在列表视图上使用所需的图标名称指定 data-split-icon 属性来为右拆分图标设置图标。默认图标为“ carat-r”，但可以使用 splitIcon listview选项进行配置。通过将 data-icon 属性添加到列表项，可以为每个拆分设置单独的图标。拆分按钮默认的主题样本颜色为“B”（在缺省主题蓝），但可以通过指定与色板信设定 data-split-theme 在列表视图级别属性或用于与各个分割 data-theme 链接级别的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can shield elements and their children from enhancement by adding the attribute data-enhance="false" to an element. This will cause it, and all its children to be ignored by .enhanceWithin(). Unfortunately, checking elements to see whether they are children of an element that has been marked with data-enhance="false" is performance-intensive. Thus, the presence of data-enhance="false" will only be considered if the global flag $.mobile.ignoreContentEnabled is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过将属性 data-enhance="false" 添加到元素来保护元素及其子元素免受增强。这将导致它及其所有子级被 .enhanceWithin() 忽略。不幸的是，检查元素以查看它们是否是已标记为 data-enhance="false" 的元素的子代会占用大量性能。因此，仅当全局标志 $.mobile.ignoreContentEnabled 设置为 true 时,才会考虑 data-enhance="false" enhance =“ false”的存在。

trans-unit.source: You can then write a CSS rule in your stylesheet that targets the ui-icon-myapp-email:after class to specify the icon background source. The framework contains an inline (data URI) SVG test and adds class ui-nosvg to the html element if this is not supported. If you are using SVG icons you can use this class to provide a fallback to external PNG icons.
trans-unit.target: 然后，您可以在样式表中编写针对 ui-icon-myapp-email:after 类的CSS规则，以指定图标背景源。该框架包含一个内联（数据URI）SVG测试，如果不支持，则将 ui-nosvg 类添加到 html 元素中。如果您使用的是SVG图标，则可以使用此类来提供对外部PNG图标的备用。

trans-unit.source: You can turn on "reveal" mode by adding the attribute data-filter-reveal="true" to the element whose children will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过将属性 data-filter-reveal="true" 到将要过滤其子元素的元素来启用“显示”模式。

trans-unit.source: You can use .buttonMarkup() to style any element as a button that is attractive and useable on a mobile device. It is a convenience function that allows you to manipulate the classes related to button styling. For each element in the set of matched elements this function converts the options parameter to a list of classes to be applied to the element, while respecting the element's existing classes that are not related to button styling. You may also set the parameter overwriteClasses to true for performance reasons. When overwriteClasses is set to true the function discards existing classes and applies the classes corresponding to the options provided.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 .buttonMarkup() 将任何元素设置为在移动设备上有吸引力且可用的按钮。它是一项便利功能，允许您操纵与按钮样式相关的类。对于匹配元素集中的每个元素，此函数将 options 参数转换为要应用于该元素的类的列表，同时注意该元素与按钮样式无关的现有类。您也可以出于性能原因将参数 overwriteClasses 设置为 true 。当 overwriteClasses 设置为 true 时,该函数将丢弃现有的类并应用与提供的选项相对应的类。

trans-unit.source: You may use any priority naming convention and assign as many (or few) levels of priority for the columns. The plugin simply generates class names based on the values in the data-priority attribute so even though we default to using a numeric system of 1-6, any naming convention is possible.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用任何优先级命名约定，并为列分配尽可能多（或很少）的优先级。该插件仅基于 data-priority 属性中的值生成类名称，因此，即使我们默认使用1-6的数字系统，任何命名约定也是可能的。
